did.unittitle: Smith-Houston-Ogden family papers. Rebecca L. Smith papers (series 60)

bioghist.p: Rebecca Levis Wood (1837-1925) was the daughter of Margaret Garrett Levis and Joseph Wood. Margaret was a descendant of Samuel Levis (1649-1734), an early immigrant to Pennsylvania, where he settled in 1682. Rebecca married A. Lewis Smith (1831-1914) in 1859. The couple settled in Media, Delaware County, Pennsylvania and had four children. One son, Lewis Lawrence Smith, was the father of Lawrence M. C. Smith (1902-1975).

scopecontent.p: The papers include letters to Smith, especially from family members, household and personal account ledgers, newspaper clippings collected by Smith, copies of her will, and letters of condolence to Rebecca on the occasion of the death of her husband, A. Lewis Smith in 1914.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
